# iOS Swipeable Drawer

## release on 20240425
## description
## changes
The MUI <code>&lt;SwipeableDrawer /&gt;</code> is <a href="https://github.com/mui/material-ui/issues/15689" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/mui/material-ui/issues/15689/hovercard">not working on iOS devices</a>.

<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19227776/325565344-c7abcfc0-9db0-4230-85aa-afecd2b5402a.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Ed7GRE91JpH3jaVtRqofbWynnph5MX3Lt_07JOvCRVY"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19227776/325565344-c7abcfc0-9db0-4230-85aa-afecd2b5402a.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Ed7GRE91JpH3jaVtRqofbWynnph5MX3Lt_07JOvCRVY" alt="image" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>

The <code>&lt;Scaffold3 /&gt;</code> component is operational on iOS devices, enabling users to employ intuitive swipe gestures with ease.

<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19227776/325565862-437b3846-b235-4d2a-b607-91f5b935a596.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SeLzLkN0Z8lEzPbdkk5dMGQ5Q2xbyaIWi-fJNcgnbS4"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19227776/325565862-437b3846-b235-4d2a-b607-91f5b935a596.gif?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SeLzLkN0Z8lEzPbdkk5dMGQ5Q2xbyaIWi-fJNcgnbS4" alt="mobile" content-type-secured-asset="image/gif" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
